name: Blanco Package
bestFor: House Parties, Small Holiday Events, Quincea√±eras
tagline: The Blanco Package is a more straightforward option, perfect for simple events that just need a professional bartender. This package focuses on efficient, friendly service without the customization, making it ideal for hosts who already know the vibe that they want and simply need a bartender to execute.
descriptions: Guest Services, Drink Preparation, and Bar Flow Management
Arrival prior to service time for set-up
Monitoring service pace and guest experience
Maintaining a clean and organized bar

name: Reposado Package
bestFor: Engagements, Showers, Graduations, Themed Parties, Mid-sized Events
tagline: The Reposado Package offers a more detailed and elevated bar experience. Often referred to as our set-menu package, this option includes collaboration between the host and bartender to craft a curated drink menu tailored to the event. It strikes the balance between simplicity and customization.
descriptions: Guest Services, Drink Preparation, and Bar Flow Management
Arrival prior to service time for set-up
Monitoring service pace and guest experience
Maintaining a clean and organized bar
Custom Cocktail Menu for 2 Cocktails, 1 Highball, and 1 Shot

name: Anejo Package
bestFor: Weddings, Large Events, Corporate Happy Hours, Luxury Celebrations
tagline: The Anejo Package is our full open bar experience. With this package guests can choose from a wide selection of drinks provided at the bar, creating a seamless and premium experience from start to finish. This is the most inclusive and elevated option we offer.
descriptions: Guest Services, Drink Preparation, and Bar Flow Management
Arrival prior to service time for set-up
Monitoring service pace and guest experience
Maintaining a clean and organized bar
Custom Cocktail Menu for 3 Cocktails, 2 Highballs, and 2 Shots
